reviews.review: вайа

Pourrait être meilleur si jouer vraiment l'objectif donnait plus de points.
Beaucoup trop de tueurs campeurs et ces derniers gagnent plus de points qu'un survivant qui prendrait des risques.
Les prix des cosmétiques sont un peu ridicules.
Un bon jeu solo si vous jouez tueur mais à faire à plusieurs si vous voulez jouer survivant.

Au final on continue de jouer en souvenir des quelques parties qu'on a trouvé vraiment sympa, mais celles là n'arrivent qu'une fois sur six.

我先来！首先这是一个4打1公平游戏，4个偷电贼将在一个封闭的地图中与农场主斗智斗勇。这个游戏有韩服和日服。韩服的话会碰到主机玩家（小地球），他们大多特别喜欢吃草蹲蘑菇钻柜子当柜皇，拖慢比赛节奏，如果你是追求速修的话建议找三个朋友一起四黑吧。反正我真的是被吃草蹲蘑菇当柜皇的队友坑的神志不清了。希望DBD越来越好，走向更广阔的世界，迈入中国尘封的大门（dbd国内平台不让直播）

玩了有一段时间了吧，这款游戏带给我的主要一点就是恐怖，所以我主要选择杀手玩。主要的时间应该是被匹配占据的，但是能玩一局那种感觉还是不同于别的竞技游戏的。当你真正进入游戏时就该开始你的活了，你的主要任务杀死全部逃生者，逃生者要脱逃这个由恶灵（尼娅）精心设计的游戏中，记住当你进入游戏的时候可能会截然不同，这里有许多不同与自定义标签，当然这款游戏给我的快乐还是有的，我坐在电脑面前玩了一天这个游戏吧，那些漏洞和神仙我一个没遇到，应该是我好久没打了吧。当然如果你要把这款游戏发扬光大那么你应该严抓外挂，当然漏洞这些还是从娱乐方面动手，这个漏洞要是人畜无害你根本没必要迫害它吧？毕竟清除一个漏洞可能会涌现更多漏洞！最后很喜欢开发人员的一句话“Pretty good job so far”这是有资本的自信！

This is a very fun casual game with a unique concept. Unfortunately I cannot recommend it.

Most people will tell you the community is toxic and that there are bugs, and that's true. But what you may not know is that the game is poorly balanced, and that it is impossible to actually balance. The playerbase is split into three ways of playing. One is the killer who is alone. The others are teams that use third-party voice communication like Discord to fight the killer, and teams consisting of randomly matched players that do not have voice comms.

What this means is that the game is very badly survivor-sided at the highest levels, and any attempt to fix this to make the killer more effective will destroy the casual playerbase of people that queue alone from various platforms looking for a casual match. 

They could start fixing it by enabling voice communication for even random players, but that would destroy the theme they are going for and damage their sales. The developers prioritize sales over the game's balance, stability, and even overall quality, especially since they have a schedule to release new DLC every 3 months.

One of my nieces showed me this game. I watched her stream but didn't think it would be for me. Finally took a chance on it and was REALLY impressed. Game play is fun right out of the box. Probably the most well balanced multi-player game I've ever played. The best thing is that you don't have to "win" to have a great time. Winning one epic chase in a round can make the game fun even if you don't escape or the survivors do escape and you're the killer.

I also like that you can play a couple rounds without it taking a lot of time. It's perfect for people who have limited time to play.  I wish I would have found this game a lot sooner - I'm not generally a big horror fan but this game is fantastic!

Also if you appreciate good audio in a game they use their audio really effectively to create the creepy feel that makes the game so fun.

Игра является третьесортным куском говна без баланса. Ты 9-ый ранг ? (Условно) Тогда играй против 17-20. Главное, что определяет соревновательный режим в игре тут работает через жопу коня. Почему у меня так много часов в игре ? Если у Вас есть друзья и их достоточное количество, то в эту помойку можно и сыграть.

Dead by Daylight is a very repetitive "monster versus survivors" game. You have five players, four of them are survivors trying to power generators to escape, and one of them is a monster with a special ability.

That's it. Seriously.

Bonus points if you want to throw in trying to juke out the monster and distract it while your teammates power the generators. 

The only thing that makes this game even relatively interesting is the fact that each monster and survivor character has their own unique ability and function. Sure, you can upgrade some things and get some cool costumes, but not more.

On top of this, the developers have gotten very greedy. Lots of new DLC for maps and skins have come out and they are trying to reel people into buying them. 

Also, the playerbase is extremely toxic.

This game, even with a group of the best friends, is simply not good, nor is it scary.

I have a love hate relationship with this game, but it seems to be all I play lately... 

It is super fun when you have good team mates and the killer doesn't have awful tactics, so i guess its heavily based on the community!
